name: Animal Crossing Character Maker
description:
Create your own Animal Crossing style character using Figma components! Now you, too, can experience Animal Crossing without a Switch :'') 🍃🏠

=====

I created this to learn how to Illustrate in Figma and develop a better understanding of how component instances can be used! There are dozens of components to customize your character's face and over 60 unique clothing assets 👚👕👗

Have fun and share your creations! 🎉🎊🥳
